name: Acne
symptom: Whiteheads (closed plugged pores),Large, solid, painful lumps under the skin (nodules),Pimples (pustules), which are papules with pus at their tips.
precuation: Low glycemic index diet,Milk products,Fat and fatty acids
description: Acne is a skin condition that occurs when your hair follicles become plugged with oil and dead skin cells. It causes whiteheads, blackheads or pimples. Acne is most common among teenagers, though it affects people of all ages.

name: AIDS
symptom: Fever, Headache,Muscle aches and joint pain, Rash, Sore throat and painful mouth sores, wollen lymph glands, mainly on the neck,  Diarrhe, Weight loss, Cough, Night sweats.
precuation: When you have open or healing wounds, or skin infections.When in contact with blood or body fluids, secretions, excretions or non-intact skin. When in contact with surfaces or articles contaminated with blood or body fluids.When carrying out cleaning or decontamination procedures.
description: HIV (human immunodeficiency virus) is a virus that attacks the body’s immune system. If HIV is not treated, it can lead to AIDS (acquired immunodeficiency syndrome).
Medicine_Name: Nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors (NRTIs) , Non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors (NNRTIs), Integrase inhibitors, Protease inhibitors (PIs).

name: Alcoholic hepatitis
symptom: Loss of appetite . Nausea and vomiting, Abdominal tenderness. Fever, often low grade .Fatigue and weakness.
precuation: maintaining a healthy weight, getting regular exercise , avoiding toxins and illegal drugs,receiving vaccinations.
description: Alcoholic hepatitis is inflammation of the liver caused by drinking alcohol.Alcoholic hepatitis is most likely to occur in people who drink heavily over many years. However, the relationship between drinking and alcoholic hepatitis is complex. Not all heavy drinkers develop alcoholic hepatitis, and the disease can occur in people who drink only moderately.

name: Allergy
symptom: Tingling in the mouth, Swelling of the lips, face or tongue, Hives, Itchy skin, Rashes or hives, Wheezing, Swelling of the face, Swelling at the site , Itching or hives, Cough, wheezing, shortness of breath.
precuation: For children, don’t allow stuffed animals in the bed—they trap dust and other allergens. Try to avoid carpet and rugs at home—they hold onto allergens; if you have carpet, vacuum as often as possible.Clean your air conditioning filters regularly—your filter traps many of the allergy-causing fibers, pollens, dust, and more that can lead to allergic reactions.Keep an allergy diary—record what causes or increases your symptoms; track the foods you eat and activities you do to look for triggers; also record what seems to help and share that information with your doctor.
description: Some substances we live with every day like pollen, dust, or peanuts may not bother most people, but your immune system might mistake them for something harmful and go into overdrive, producing antibodies to fight that allergen. Common allergens include mold spores, pet dander, insect stings, foods, certain types of medicine, and more.
Medicine_Name: Diphenhydramine,Chlorpheniramine, Azelastine (Astelin, Astepro), Olopatadine (Patanase),Ketotifen (Alaway, Zaditor), Olopatadine (Pataday, Patanol, Pazeo), Pheniramine and naphazoline (Visine, Opcon-A, others).

name: Arthritis
symptom: Pain, Stiffness, Swelling, Redness, Decreased range of motion.
precuation: Hold the back of a chair or a wall with one hand, Bend the opposite knee., Holding your leg just above the ankle, pull it gently back toward your buttocks.
description: Arthritis is the swelling and tenderness of one or more joints. The main symptoms of arthritis are joint pain and stiffness, which typically worsen with age. The most common types of arthritis are osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis.
Medicine_Name: Analgesics, Nonsteroidal Anti-inflammatory Drugs (NSAIDs), Corticosteroids,Disease-Modifying Antirheumatic Drugs (DMARDs).

name: Bronchial Asthma
symptom: Chest tightness, Coughing, especially at night or early morning, Shortness of breath,Wheezing, which causes a whistling sound when you breathe out.
precuation: Air pollution, Cold air, A cold or flu virus, Smoke.
description: Asthma is a long-term inflammatory disease of the airways of the lungs.It is characterized by variable and recurring symptoms, reversible airflow obstruction, and easily triggered bronchospasms. Symptoms include episodes of wheezing, coughing, chest tightness, and shortness of breath.These may occur a few times a day or a few times per week.Depending on the person, asthma symptoms may become worse at night or with exercise.
Medicine_Name: Fluticasone (Flovent HFA, Arnuity Ellipta, others), Budesonide (Pulmicort Flexhaler), Mometasone (Asmanex Twisthaler), Beclomethasone (Qvar RediHaler), Ciclesonide (Alvesco).

name: Cervical spondylosis
symptom: neck pain,stiffness, Pain usually comes and goes, with flare-ups followed by symptom-free periods.
precuation: Follow your doctor's treatment plan and continue your home exercise plan (if you were in physical therapy).Sit and stand properly. Learn to lift correctly.Exercise regularly. (Aerobic exercise is especially good).
description: This information may be useful for those who have been diagnosed with cervical spondylosis. People who are experiencing new or ongoing symptoms should visit their healthcare professional for assessment, diagnosis or treatment.
Medicine_Name: NSAIDs - Acetylsalicylic acid, naproxen, ibuprofen, indomethacin, mefenamic acid, piroxicam, Corticosteroids - Oral prednisone or single IM injection,  Muscle relaxants - Cyclobenzaprine, methocarbamol, and baclofen, Narcotic agents.

name: Chicken pox
symptom: fever, tiredness, loss of appetite, headache.
precuation: The best way to prevent chickenpox is to get the chickenpox vaccine. Everyone—including children, adolescents, and adults—should get two doses of chickenpox vaccine if they have never had chickenpox or were never vaccinated.
description: Chickenpox is a highly contagious disease caused by the varicella-zoster virus (VZV). It can cause an itchy, blister-like rash among other symptoms. The rash first appears on the chest, back, and face, and then spreads over the entire body.
Medicine_Name: calamine lotion,  katseye blends, acyclovir,chickenpox vaccine.

name: Chronic cholestasis
symptom: jaundice, which is a yellowing of your skin and the white of your eyes, dark urine, light-colored stool, pain in your abdomen, fatigue.
precuation: Anabolic steroids, Fatigue, Bone disease: osteopenia, osteoporosis.
description: Cholestasis is a liver disease. It occurs when the flow of bile from your liver is reduced or blocked. Bile is fluid produced by your liver that aids in the digestion of food, especially fats.There are two types of cholestasis: intrahepatic cholestasis and extrahepatic cholestasis.
Medicine_Name: some antibiotics, such as amoxicillin (Amoxil, Moxatag) and minocycline (Minocin), anabolic steroids, certain antiepileptic drugs.

name: Common Cold
symptom: Runny or stuffy nose, store throat, cough, congestion, sneezing, generally feeling unwell.
precuation: Wash your hands often. Avoid touching your face.  Don't smoke.Keep household surfaces clean.
description: The common cold is a viral infection of your nose and throat (upper respiratory tract). It's usually harmless, although it might not feel that way. Many types of viruses can cause a common cold.
Medicine_Name: Paracetamol , Ibuprofen , Decongestants and saline nasal sprays or drops to relieve a blocked nose.

name: Dengue
symptom: Decreased urination, Few or no tears, Dry mouth or lips, Lethargy or confusion, Cold or clammy extremities.
precuation: Keep your house clean and tidy.Do not leave stagnant water lying anywhere in or around the house. It\'s very dangerous as these misquotes lie on this stagnant water only, it doesn\'t matter if it is dirty or clean.
description: Dengue viruses are spread to people through the bite of an infected Aedes species (Ae. aegypti or Ae. albopictus) mosquito. Almost half of the world\'s population, about 4 billion people, live in areas with a risk of dengue. Dengue is often a leading cause of illness in areas with risk.

name: Diabetes
symptom: Feeling more thirsty than usual., Urinating often., Losing weight without trying., Feeling tired and weak, Having slow-healing sores. , Having blurry vision.
precuation: Make a commitment to managing your diabetes, Don't smoke, Keep your blood pressure and cholesterol under control,Schedule regular physicals and eye exams,Keep your vaccines up to date.
description: Diabetes is a serious disease. Following your diabetes treatment plan takes round-the-clock commitment. But your efforts are worthwhile. Careful diabetes care can reduce your risk of serious — even life-threatening — complications.

name: Dimorphic hemmorhoids(piles)
symptom: Itching or irritation in your anal region,Pain or discomfort,Swelling around your anus, Bleeding.
precuation: Eating high fiber foods, Being more active, Not pushing if constipated, Drinking plenty of water.
description: Hemorrhoids (HEM-uh-roids), also called piles, are swollen veins in your anus and lower rectum, similar to varicose veins. Hemorrhoids can develop inside the rectum (internal hemorrhoids) or under the skin around the anus (external hemorrhoids).

name: Drug Reaction
symptom: Skin rash or hives, Itching, Wheezing or other breathing problems, Swelling, Anaphylaxis.
precuation: Precaution of drug reaction requires familiarity with the drug and potential reactions to it.
description: The most common symptoms of drug reaction are hives, rash or fever. But a drug reaction also may cause serious reactions. This includes a severe, life-threatening condition known as anaphylaxis.

name: Fungal infection
symptom: joint pain ,stiffness ,severe ,headaches ,dizziness.
precuation: living in a warm or wet environment ,sweating heavily , not keeping your skin clean and dry ,sharing items like clothing, shoes, towels, or bedding ,wearing tight clothing or footwear that doesn’t breathe well, taking part in activities that involve frequent skin-to-skin contact.
description: A malar rash is a skin outbreak or eruption on the cheeks and the bridge of the nose. The rash is red or purple and may be either blotchy or solid in appearance. It is commonly known as a “butterfly rash” due to its distinctive butterfly shape.

name: Gastroenteritis
symptom: Watery, usually nonbloody diarrhea — bloody diarrhea usually means you have a different, more severe infection, Nausea, vomiting or both, Stomach cramps and pain, Occasional muscle aches or headach.
precuation: Washing our hand with soap everyday. do not eat fast food. Eat home made food. if someone has stomach flu in your house stay away from him and don't use his things. Don't drink tap water.Don't eat road food.
description: Gastroenteritis is an uncomfortable and inconvenient ailment, but is rarely life-threatening in the United States and other developed nations. Viral gastroenteritis is frequently referred to as the stomach or intestinal flu, although the influenza virus is not associated with this illness.
Medicine_Name: ondansetron, doxycycline, ceftriaxone, Vibramycin,  Doxy 100, ampicillin, Morgidox.

name: GERD
symptom: heartburn, a painful, burning feeling in the middle of your chest, behind your breastbone, rising from the lower tip of your breastbone toward your throat.
precuation: Seek immediate medical care if you have chest pain, especially if you also have shortness of breath, or jaw or arm pain. These may be signs and symptoms of a heart attack.
description: Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) occurs when stomach acid repeatedly flows back into the tube connecting your mouth and stomach (esophagus). This backwash (acid reflux) can irritate the lining of your esophagus.
Medicine_Name: omeprazole, pantoprazole, Nexium,  famotidine, Protonix,  Prilosec OTC,  Acid Controller Maximum Strength.

name: Heartattack
symptom: Chest pain that may feel like pressure, tightness, pain, squeezing or aching, Cold sweat,Fatigue ,Heartburn or indigestion ,Lightheadedness or sudden dizziness,Nausea.
precuation: Quit smoking, Keep check and control the cholesterol levels, Control blood pressure levels, Exercise and be physically fit, Loose the extra weights,Choose a diet for a healthy hear.
description: A heart attack occurs when the flow of blood to the heart is severely reduced or blocked. The blockage is usually due to a buildup of fat, cholesterol and other substances in the heart (coronary) arteries. The fatty, cholesterol-containing deposits are called plaques. The process of plaque buildup is called atherosclerosis.

name: Hepatitis A
symptom: Unusual tiredness and weakness,Sudden nausea and vomiting and diarrhea,Abdominal pain or discomfort, especially on the upper right side beneath your lower ribs, which is over your liver, Loss of appetite .Joint pain. Yellowing of the skin and the whites of your eyes (jaundice).
precuation: Hepatitis A is a highly contagious liver infection caused by the hepatitis A virus. The virus is one of several types of hepatitis viruses that cause liver inflammation and affect your liver's ability to function.
description: Hepatitis A is a highly contagious liver infection caused by the hepatitis A virus. The virus is one of several types of hepatitis viruses that cause liver inflammation and affect your liver's ability to function.Avoid unclean food and water.
Medicine_Name: hapatitis A vaccine inactivated 10ml,sofosbuvir, sovaldi sofosbuvir 400mg.

name: Hepatitis B
symptom: Abdominal pain. Dark urine. Fever. joint pain. Loss of appetite.Weakness and fatigue.
precuation: Newborns. Children and adolescents not vaccinated at birth.People who live with someone who has hepatitis B.
description: Hepatitis B is a serious liver infection caused by the hepatitis B virus (HBV). For most people, hepatitis B is short term, also called acute, and lasts less than six months. But for others, the infection becomes chronic, meaning it lasts more than six months. Having chronic hepatitis B increases your risk of developing liver failure, liver cancer or cirrhosis — a condition that permanently scars the liver.
Medicine_Name: Tenofovir disoproxil (Viread), Tenofovir alafenamide (Vemlidy), Entecavir (Baraclude),Adefovir Dipivoxil (Hepsera).

name: Hepatitis C
symptom: Bleeding easily. Bruising easily.Fatigue.Poor appetite.Yellow discoloration of the skin and eyes (jaundice).
precuation: Measure the quantity of the hepatitis C virus in your blood (viral load).Identify the genotype of the virus.Liver biopsy.
description: Hepatitis C is a viral infection that causes liver inflammation, sometimes leading to serious liver damage. The hepatitis C virus (HCV) spreads through contaminated blood.

name: Hepatitis D
symptom: Yellow skin and eyes (jaundice), Stomach upset, Pain in your belly, Throwing up, Fatigue.
precuation: Newborns. Children and adolescents not vaccinated at birth.People who live with someone who has hepatitis D.
description: Hepatitis D is a liver infection you can get if you have hepatitis B. It can cause serious symptoms that can lead to lifelong liver damage and even death. It’s sometimes called hepatitis delta virus (HDV) or delta hepatitis.

name: Hepatitis E
symptom: yellowing of the skin (jaundice). dark urine. joint pain.a loss of appetite.pain in the abdomen. liver enlargement.
precuation: Newborns. Children and adolescents not vaccinated at birth.People who live with someone who has hepatitis B.
description: Most cases of hepatitis E are caused by drinking water contaminated by fecal matter. Living in or traveling to countries with poor sanitation can increase your risk. This is especially true in overcrowded areas.

name: Hypertension
symptom: Headaches, Shortness of breath, Nosebleeds.
precuation: Blood pressure screening is an important part of general health care. How often you should get your blood pressure checked depends on your age and overall health.Ask your provider for a blood pressure reading at least every two years starting at age 18. If you're age 40 or older, or you're 18 to 39 with a high risk of high blood pressure, ask for a blood pressure check every year.
description: High blood pressure is a common condition that affects the body's arteries. It's also called hypertension. If you have high blood pressure, the force of the blood pushing against the artery walls is consistently too high. The heart has to work harder to pump blood.
Medicine_Name: chlorthalidone, chlorothiazide, metolazone, amiloride hydrochloride,furosemide,amiloride hydrochloride + hydrochlorothiazide,triamterene + hydrochlorothiazide.

name: Hyperthyroidism
symptom: nervousness, anxiety and irritability, hyperactivity – you may find it hard to stay still and have a lot of nervous energy, mood swings.
precuation: a history of autoimmune disease, previous radiation treatment to the head or neck ,family history of thyroid problems.
description: Hypothyroidism is when the thyroid gland does not produce enough thyroid hormones to meet the needs of the body. The thyroid is underactive.

name: Hypoglycemia
symptom: Looking pale, Shakiness, Sweating, Headache, Hunger or nausea, An irregular or fast heartbeat, Fatigue.
precuation: Monitor your blood sugar, Don't skip or delay meals or snacks, Measure medication carefully and take it on time.
description: Hypoglycemia is a condition in which your blood sugar (glucose) level is lower than the standard range. Glucose is your body's main energy source.

name: Impetigo
symptom: The main symptom of impetigo is reddish sores, often around the nose and mouth. The sores quickly rupture, ooze for a few days and then form a honey-colored crust. Sores can spread to other areas of the body through touch, clothing and towels. Itching and soreness are generally mild.
precuation: Resist the urge to touch (and scratch) your sores, Keep the sores clean and covered,Use a clean washcloth and towel each time you wash.
description: Impetigo (im-puh-TIE-go) is a common and highly contagious skin infection that mainly affects infants and young children. It usually appears as reddish sores on the face, especially around the nose and mouth and on the hands and feet. Over about a week, the sores burst and develop honey-colored crusts.

name: Jaundice
symptom: Your baby's skin becomes more yellow, The skin on your baby's the abdomen, arms or legs looks yellow, The whites of your baby's eyes look yellow, Your baby seems listless or sick or is difficult to awaken.
precuation: Eating a well-balanced diet supports your liver health and may help clear jaundice symptoms. This includes drinking water and eating vegetables and lean protein while avoiding alcohol and certain foods.
description: jaundice is a common condition, particularly in babies born before 38 weeks' gestation (preterm babies) and some breast-fed babies. Infant jaundice usually occurs because a baby's liver isn't mature enough to get rid of bilirubin in the bloodstream. In some babies, an underlying disease may cause infant jaundic.

name: Malaria
symptom: Fever, vomiting, headache, yellow skin.
precuation: If you're travelling to an area where malaria is found, get advice from a GP, nurse, pharmacist or travel clinic before you go.It's best to do this at least 4 to 6 weeks before you travel, but you can still get advice at the last minute if you need to.You may be prescribed antimalarial tablets to reduce the risk of getting malaria and told how you can prevent mosquito bites.
description: Malaria is a mosquito-borne disease caused by a parasite. People with malaria often experience fever, chills, and flu-like illness. Left untreated, they may develop severe complications and die. In 2020 an estimated 241 million cases of malaria occurred worldwide and 627,000 people died, mostly children in sub-Saharan Africa. About 2,000 cases of malaria are diagnosed in the United States each year. The vast majority of cases in the United States are in travelers and immigrants returning from countries where malaria transmission occurs, many from sub-Saharan Africa and South Asia.
Medicine_Name: Chloroquine phosphate.Artemisinin-based combination therapies (ACTs).Atovaquone-proguanil (Malarone).Quinine sulfate (Qualaquin) with doxycycline (Oracea, Vibramycin, others).Primaquine phosphate.

name: Migraine
symptom: Being sensitive to light, sound, or smell, Fatigue, Food cravings or lack of appetite, Mood changes,Severe thirst.
precuation: Sleep well, Eat wisely,Exercise regularly, Manage stress
description: Migraine is a neurologic disorder that often causes a strong headache. The headache comes in episodes and sometimes also comes with nausea, vomiting, and sensitivity to light.
Medicine_Name: Almotriptan (Axert), Eletriptan (Relpax), Frovatriptan (Frova), Naratriptan (Amerge), Rizatriptan (Maxalt),Sumatriptan (Alsuma, Imitrex, Onzetra, Sumavel, Zembrace),Zolmitriptan (Zomig).

name: Osteoarthristis
symptom: Pain,Stiffness, Tenderness, Loss of flexibility,Grating sensation, Bone spurs, swelling.
precuation: Stay active, Eat a balanced diet, Lose weight, Sleep well.
description: Osteoarthritis is the most common form of arthritis, affecting millions of people worldwide. It occurs when the protective cartilage that cushions the ends of the bones wears down over time.

name: Paralysis (brain hemorrhage)
symptom: numbness or pain in the affected muscles, muscle weakness, visible signs of muscle loss (muscle atrophy), stiffness,involuntary spasms or twitches.
precuation: Adaptive equipment, Assistive equipment, Orthotic/prosthetic devices, Voice-activated technology.
description: Paralysis refers to temporary or permanent loss of voluntary muscle movement in a body part or region.

name: Paroymsal  Positional Vertigo (Vertigo)
symptom: spontaneous – no cause, with the risk increasing with age, trauma; for example, after a knock to the head or concussion , recent inner ear infection.
precuation: You may experience mild dizziness or feel a bit ‘off’ for up to a week after the BPPV episod.
description: BPPV is one of the most common forms of vertigo. Vertigo is a feeling of movement when the body is not actually moving. This often feels like the room is spinning, causing you to feel dizzy.

name: Peptic ulcer disease
symptom: Burning stomach pain, Feeling of fullness, bloating or belching,Intolerance to fatty foods, Heartburn,Nausea.
precuation: Maintenance dose (relapse may ocur), Dose reduction in servere renal or haptic failure and elderly.
description: The most common causes of peptic ulcers are infection with the bacterium Helicobacter pylori (H. pylori) and long-term use of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) such as ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin IB, others) and naproxen sodium (Aleve). Stress and spicy foods do not cause peptic ulcers. However, they can make your symptoms worse. Low-grade fever
Medicine_Name: proton pump inhibitors: omeprazole,lansoprazole, Histamine receptor blockers: cmetidine, famotidine.

name: Pneumonia
symptom: Chest pain when you breathe or cough,Confusion or changes in mental awareness (in adults age 65 and older),Cough, which may produce phlegm, Fatigue, Fever, sweating and shaking chills,Nausea, vomiting or diarrhea.
precuation: Get vaccinated, Make sure children get vaccinated, Practice good hygiene, Don't smoke.
description: Pneumonia is an infection that inflames the air sacs in one or both lungs. The air sacs may fill with fluid or pus (purulent material), causing cough with phlegm or pus, fever, chills, and difficulty breathing. A variety of organisms, including bacteria, viruses and fungi, can cause pneumonia.
Medicine_Name: Chest X-ray showing pneumonia,Pneumonia and your lungs, moxifloxacin 400mg, clarithromycin 250mg.

name: Psoriasis
symptom: Dry, cracked skin that may bleed,Itching, burning or soreness,Rashes that vary in color, tending to be shades of purple with gray scale on brown or Black skin and pink or red with silver scale on white skin.
precuation: Use Moisturizing Creams, . Take Care of Your Skin,  Avoid Dry, Cold Weather.
description: Psoriasis is a skin disease that causes a rash with itchy, scaly patches, most commonly on the knees, elbows, trunk and scalp.
Medicine_Name: psoriasin, psoriasis relief cream, psoriasis therapy.

name: Tuberculosis
symptom: Coughing for three or more weeks, Coughing up blood or mucus,Chest pain, or pain with breathing or coughing,  Unintentional weight loss, Loss of appetite.
precuation: Stay home. Ventilate the room. Cover your mouth.Wear a face mask. Finish your medication.
description: Tuberculosis (TB) is a potentially serious infectious disease that mainly affects the lungs. The bacteria that cause tuberculosis are spread from person to person through tiny droplets released into the air via coughs and sneezes.

name: Typhoid
symptom: High fever, Headache, Stomach pain, Constipation or diarrhea.
precuation: Safe drinking water, improved sanitation and adequate medical care can help prevent and control typhoid fever. Unfortunately, in many developing nations, these may be difficult to achieve. For this reason, some experts believe that vaccines are the best way to control typhoid fever.
description: Typhoid fever is a serious disease that can cause death. It is caused by a germ called Salmonella typhi, and is spread most often through infected food or water. Typhoid may also be spread by close person-to-person contact with infected persons (such as occurs with persons living in the same household). Some infected persons do not appear to be sick, but they can still spread the germ to others.

name: Varicoseveins
symptom: Veins that are dark purple or blue,Veins that appear twisted and bulging, often appearing like cords on the legs, An achy or heavy feeling in the legs,Burning, throbbing, muscle cramping and swelling in the lower legs.
precuation: Avoiding high heels and tight hosiery, Changing your sitting or standing position regularly, Eating a high-fiber, low-salt diet , Exercising.
description: Varicose veins are twisted, enlarged veins. Any vein that is close to the skin's surface (superficial) can become varicosed. Varicose veins most commonly affect the veins in the legs. That's because standing and walking increase the pressure in the veins of the lower body.

name: Urinary tract infection
symptom: A strong urge to urinate that doesn't go away,A burning feeling when urinating,Urinating often, and passing small amounts of urine.
precuation: Drink plenty of liquids, especially water, Try cranberry juice, Wipe from front to back,Empty your bladder soon after having sex.
description: A urinary tract infection (UTI) is an infection in any part of the urinary system. The urinary system includes the kidneys, ureters, bladder and urethra. Most infections involve the lower urinary tract — the bladder and the urethra.
